string-array.item: Sweet Potato and Venison Shepherd\'s Pie

string-array.name: meal_descriptions
string-array.item: A chicken curry with the balanced elements of spicy and sour with the traditional flavors of Southeast Asia. \nServe with basmati rice. This will taste even better if you leave it for a day or two before eating.
A hearty, warming, and comforting venison shepherd\'s pie that\'s perfect for opening day!
It takes a little work, but it is worth it.
This is the best and most delicious salmon recipe, and very easy to prepare. \nI love maple in everything and put this together one night.
A very simple and easy marinade that makes your shrimp so yummy you don\'t even need cocktail sauce! \nTry it with a salad, baked potato, and garlic bread. You will not be disappointed!!!
Two day ribs, but worth the effort. \nBaked and marinated with a rub overnight, then grilled with barbecue sauce.
